verses.plain: In that day there shall be a fountain opened to the house of David and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem for sin and for uncleanness.

tokens.t: In that day there shall be a fountain opened to the house of David and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem for sin and for uncleanness.

verses.plain: ¶ And it shall come to pass in that day, saith the LORD of hosts, that I will cut off the names of the idols out of the land, and they shall no more be remembered: and also I will cause the prophets and the unclean spirit to pass out of the land.

tokens.t: ¶ And it shall come to pass in that day, saith the
of hosts,
I will cut off the names of the idols out of the land, and they shall no more be remembered: and also I will cause the prophets and the unclean spirit to pass out of the land.

verses.plain: And it shall come to pass, that when any shall yet prophesy, then his father and his mother that begat him shall say unto him, Thou shalt not live; for thou speakest lies in the name of the LORD: and his father and his mother that begat him shall thrust him through when he prophesieth.

tokens.t: And it shall come to pass,
when any shall yet prophesy, then his father and his mother that begat him shall say unto him, Thou shalt not live; for thou speakest lies in the name of the
: and his father and his mother that begat him shall thrust him through when he prophesieth.

verses.plain: And it shall come to pass in that day, that the prophets shall be ashamed every one of his vision, when he hath prophesied; neither shall they wear a rough garment to deceive:

tokens.t: And it shall come to pass in that day,
the prophets shall be ashamed every one of his vision, when he hath prophesied; neither shall they wear a rough garment to deceive:

verses.plain: But he shall say, I am no prophet, I am an husbandman; for man taught me to keep cattle from my youth.

tokens.t: But he shall say, I
no prophet, I
an husbandman; for man taught me to keep cattle from my youth.

verses.plain: And one shall say unto him, What are these wounds in thine hands? Then he shall answer, Those with which I was wounded in the house of my friends.

tokens.t: And
shall say unto him, What
these wounds in thine hands? Then he shall answer,
with which I was wounded
the house of my friends.

verses.plain: ¶ Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man that is my fellow, saith the LORD of hosts: smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered: and I will turn mine hand upon the little ones.

tokens.t: ¶ Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man
my fellow, saith the
of hosts: smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered: and I will turn mine hand upon the little ones.

verses.plain: And it shall come to pass, that in all the land, saith the LORD, two parts therein shall be cut off and die; but the third shall be left therein.

tokens.t: And it shall come to pass,
in all the land, saith the
, two parts therein shall be cut off
die; but the third shall be left therein.

verses.plain: And I will bring the third part through the fire, and will refine them as silver is refined, and will try them as gold is tried: they shall call on my name, and I will hear them: I will say, It is my people: and they shall say, The LORD is my God.

tokens.t: And I will bring the third part through the fire, and will refine them as silver is refined, and will try them as gold is tried: they shall call on my name, and I will hear them: I will say, It
my people: and they shall say, The
my God.
